#summary A simple method to retrieve the association model from SSAS
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

I've searched a lot for a way to get my model as a text file from the SSAS, but found the only way. Here it is.


= Details =

 # Launch *Microsoft SQL Management Studio*
 # Connect to your server
 # Create new *DMX* Query `SELECT * FROM [Process Events].CONTENT`
 # Execute the query on your mining model
 # Copy all the table with results with Ctrl + C
 # Open Notepad and paste it with Ctrl + V
 # Save the file and use it in DMVoW
